functionDecorators.name: claimAllDividends
functionDecorators.description: Allows a referral tree to claim all the dividends.

parameterDecorators.name: _referral
parameterDecorators.description: Address of user that claims his dividends.

functionDecorators.name: claimDividends
functionDecorators.description: Allows a user to claim his dividends.

functionDecorators.name: getDepositBounds
functionDecorators.description: Returns limits of referral's stake used to determine the referral rate.

functionDecorators.name: getDepositRate
functionDecorators.description: Returns deposit rate based on the spesific referral stake and referral level.

functionDecorators.name: getDepositRates
functionDecorators.description: Returns referral rates based on referral's deplth and stake received from deposit.

functionDecorators.name: getReferralAmounts
functionDecorators.description: Returns amounts that generate reward for referral bu levels.

returnDecorators.description: Returns amounts that generate reward for referral bu levels.

functionDecorators.name: getStakingRateRange
functionDecorators.description: Returns stakong rate for the spesific referral stake.

returnDecorators.name: _rates
returnDecorators.description: Array of stakong rates by referral level.

functionDecorators.name: getStakingRates
functionDecorators.description: Returns referral rates based on referral's deplth and stake received from staking.

functionDecorators.name: handleDepositEnd
functionDecorators.description: Allows the main farming contract to assess referral deposit rewards.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: proccessDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Allows the main farming contract to assess referral deposit rewards.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setBounds
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to update bounds.

parameterDecorators.name: _depositBounds
parameterDecorators.description: Limits of referral's stake used to determine the referral rate.

functionDecorators.name: setDepositRate
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to update deposit rates.

parameterDecorators.name: _depositRate
parameterDecorators.description: Referral rates based on referral's deplth and stake received from deposit.

functionDecorators.name: setStakingRate
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to update staking rates.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakingRate
parameterDecorators.description: Referral rates based on referral's deplth and stake received from staking.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
